t: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: iopool Smart Water Monitor - Works for Chlorine & Bromine Pools, Hot Tubs, & Swim Spas - Gives Precise Dosage recommendations.
s: The readings on the iopool device have been consistent and accurate from what I can tell when using Taylor reagents to test myself side by side. I do with that it could test actual free chlorine and total chlorine rather than "disinfection potential" but that test does give a good indication of when the chlorine needs attention.
